jobs.description: At Knowcode, I worked as a Fullstack Software Engineer in a multicultural team. I helped them developing new products and MVPs for their clients. I worked mostly with Frontend, turning design into code, creating components, tests and etc. But also I worked with some stuff on Backend, managing database relationships and APIs. Also, I took care of some deploys.

At Funcamp, I worked on one of the LARCOM projects as a Backend developer. There, I managed database relationships, joining data from multiple tables. This was used for creating a module to visualize where the resources are being used by the city hall. Also, worked with files manipulation and cleanup in Python to be used in the tables.

Studying at Unicamp was such a great opportunity to improve my knowledges about programming. I learned about project management, algorithms, design patterns and a lot of technologies. I'm really proud that I got this degree.
